verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in your <S%H7110>wrath<s%>: neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in your hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>.
For your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> stick <S%H5181>fast<s%> in <S%H3027>me<s%>, and your hand presses me <S%H5181>hard<s%>.

There is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H2195>anger<s%>; neither is there any <S%H7965>rest<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
For my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>: as a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> they are too heavy for <S%H3513>me<s%>.
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> <S%H887>stink<s%> and are <S%H4743>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
I am <S%H5753>troubled<s%>; I am bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
For my <S%H3689>body<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H7033>loathsome<s%> <S%H4974>disease<s%>: and there is no soundness in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
I am <S%H6313>feeble<s%> and <S%H3966>severely<s%> <S%H1794>broken<s%>: I have <S%H7580>groaned<s%> by reason of the <S%H5100>disquietness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H136>Lord<s%>, all my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is before <S%H585>you<s%>; and my groaning is not hid from <S%H5641>you<s%>.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>pants<s%>, my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>fails<s%> <S%H216>me<s%>: as for the light of my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H1992>it<s%> also is gone from <S%H369>me<s%>.
My <S%H157>lovers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> aloof <S%H5048>from<s%> my <S%H5061>sore<s%>; and my <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.

They also that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>life<s%> lay <S%H5367>snares<s%> for <S%H1875>me<s%>: and they that seek my <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things<s%>, and <S%H1897>imagine<s%> <S%H4820>deceits<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
But <S%H2795>I<s%>, as a deaf <S%H8085>man<s%>, heard <S%H483>not<s%>; and I was as a mute man that <S%H6605>opens<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Thus I was as a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H6310>not<s%>, and in whose mouth are no <S%H8433>reproofs<s%>.
For in <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, do I <S%H3176>hope<s%>: you will <S%H6030>hear<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For I <S%H559>said<s%>, Hear <S%H8055>me<s%>, lest otherwise they should rejoice over <S%H7272>me<s%>: when my foot <S%H4131>slips<s%>, they magnify themselves against <S%H1431>me<s%>.
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>halt<s%>, and my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
For I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; I will be <S%H1672>sorry<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
But my <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>lively<s%>, and they are <S%H6105>strong<s%>: and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> are <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>.
They also that <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%> are my <S%H7853>adversaries<s%>; because I <S%H7291>follow<s%> the thing that good <S%H2896>is<s%>.
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> me <S%H3068>not<s%>, O Lord: O my <S%H430>God<s%>, be not far from <S%H7368>me<s%>.
Make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>.
